ygData.subject: Skull of Jhen Tra (how to use it **Spoiler**)
ygData.msgSnippet: Finally, and answer!!! To use the skull you simply have a one handed weapon equipped or two free hands.  Place the skull in an open hand and Viola!!  +20 mana
ygData.messageBody:
Finally, and answer!!!

To use the skull you simply have a one handed weapon equipped or two
free hands. Place the skull in an open hand and Viola!! +20 mana and +2 SV
Magic. I believe you can use two skulls as well but you will have no melee
weapon. This is going to be my practice in a group. Or I may keep two
skulls on me and use them in emergency for that quick Gate away or that
finally spell to blast the mob to hell!.

Enjoy your skulls!

BTW: Identify (lore items) is not totally working yet. They haven't put the
descriptions in on most items yet (per Verant website).

- Ziffnab
